name: Vengeful Soul
description:
Possess your enemies as a lone ghost in this top down action game!

Made in about 3 days for GGJ Austin.

How to play:

Kill all enemies on the screen.

  • WASD: Move
  • Left Click: Possess enemy / Attack
  • Right Click: Depossess enemy
  • Space: Next level
  • R: Restart

If you're stuck, remember you have to kill ALL enemies. Even the ones you are currently possessing!

Credits:

Thanks to somepx for the font Natural.
